name: Tales Of Jade
description:
Get ready for quite the challenge! 

Tales of Jade is action packed with loads of fun features to run, fly, fight, and shoot your way through a fast paced and dangerous universe! There are many different and challenging levels to beat, hidden paths to find, shrooms to collect & enemy bosses to defeat. It´s not an easy game, you will need skill to win- so good luck. 

Jade is a mythological spirit who animates nature in her spectacular magic mushroom land filled with life and colorful mushrooms. A criminal organization has taken over and contaminated the forests and lakes with the Creel. Jade will first train and once she is prepared for battle, she will travel through contaminated forest, acid lakes, underground tunnels, and all this before the volcano explodes. She will fight the Creel that has enslaved her friends and have to ingest enough shrooms to gain the power to fight and steal the magic mushroom from Amanida to heal her world. …if she is strong enough. 

Features:

* Numerous challenging stages to win (Acid Rain Forest, Flying Mountain, Underground Tunnels, and Volcano!! ++)
* Multiple bosses to defeat
* Original graphics and music by game developer
* Collect Shrooms and use them to buy in˗app bonuses
* Funny game, all ages can play it
* Easy game control 

How to play:

* Start travelling through the first level tutorial – it will show you how to run, jump, fly, and shoot.
* Beware of the numerous enemies and toxic elements in the acid forest - the red flowers, acid bubbles, toxic water, and the lava will all take your health.
* Follow the Shooms – they will show you the path.
